mapper.sql: id, store_name, store_customer_id, store_mobile, store_address, store_region_code, store_password, shopkeeper, shop_owner_img, pickup_type, pay_type, contact_mobile, lat, lon, openid, created, created_by, created_by_name, updated, updated_by, updated_by_name, source, store_status,token
mapper.select: select sui.* from store_user_info sui left join customer_store_relation csr on sui.id = csr.store_user_id left join customer_user_info cui on cui.customer_id = csr.customer_id where cui.customer_id = #{customerUserId}

SELECT
FROM store_user_info
AND store_mobile LIKE '%${storeMobile}%'
AND store_name LIKE '%${storeName}%'
AND store_region_code LIKE '${storeRegionCode}%'
AND store_status = #{storeStatus}
mapper.insert: insert into store_user_info (id, store_name, store_customer_id, store_mobile, store_address, store_region_code, store_password, shopkeeper, shop_owner_img, pickup_type, pay_type, contact_mobile, lat, lon, openid, created, created_by, created_by_name, updated, updated_by, updated_by_name, source, store_status,token) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeCustomerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storeMobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{storeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeRegionCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{storePassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{shopkeeper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopOwnerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactMobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{storeStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update store_user_info
store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_customer_id = #{storeCustomerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
store_mobile = #{storeMobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
store_address = #{storeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_region_code = #{storeRegionCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
store_password = #{storePassword,jdbcType=CHAR},
shopkeeper = #{shopkeeper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_owner_img = #{shopOwnerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickup_type = #{pickupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_mobile = #{contactMobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update store_user_info set store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_customer_id = #{storeCustomerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_mobile = #{storeMobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, store_address = #{storeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_region_code = #{storeRegionCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, store_password = #{storePassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, shopkeeper = #{shopkeeper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_owner_img = #{shopOwnerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pickup_type = #{pickupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_mobile = #{contactMobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_by_name = #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=CHAR}, store_status = #{storeStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update store_user_info set store_region_code = #{storeRegionCode} where store_customer_id = #{storeCustomerId}
mapper.select:
select id from store_user_info where
store_region_code like '${regionCode}%'
